dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to your control panel
dashboard.startCreating: Start creating content to see your activity here

posts.title: Posts
posts.subtitle: Manage your publications
posts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post?

posts.viewPostInvalidSlugWarning: This post does not have a valid slug

posts.blogInfoErrorRedirect: Could not get blog information. You will be redirected to the blog selection page.

posts.numericIdError: Could not get the numeric ID of the post
posts.slugInUse: The slug "{slug}" is already in use. Please choose another one.
posts.createFirstPost: Create your first post to get started

form.sequenceNumberHelp: Defines the order of this post within the series.
form.slugHelp: Friendly URL for the post. It is automatically generated from the title.
form.imageWillBeDeleted: The image will be deleted upon saving

pages.viewPageInvalidSlugWarning: This page does not have a valid slug

form.slugHelp: Friendly URL for the page. It is automatically generated from the title.
form.imageWillBeDeleted: The image will be deleted upon saving

media.title: Media Library
media.subtitle: Manage your site images
media.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this image? This action cannot be undone.
media.invalidImageFormat: Only JPG, PNG, or WebP images are allowed
media.imageTooSmall: The image must be at least 800x600px (current: {width}x{height}px)

media.selectImagePrompt: Select an image (JPG, PNG or WebP, max. 5MB)

categories.title: Categories
categories.subtitle: Organize your blog categories
categories.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
categories.createFirst: Start by creating your first category

tags.title: Tags
tags.subtitle: Manage your blog tags
tags.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this tag?
tags.enterTags: Type and press Enter or comma...
tags.separateByComma: Separate tags with commas or Enter. They will be created automatically if they don't exist.

series.title: Series
series.subtitle: Manage your content series
series.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this series? Associated posts will be unlinked.

series.invalidSlug: This series does not have a valid slug
series.slugInUse: The slug "{slug}" is already in use. Please choose another one.

form.slugHelp: Friendly URL for the series. It is automatically generated from the title.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly describe what this series is about

comments.title: Comments
comments.subtitle: Moderate your blog comments
comments.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

menu.subtitle: Manage your website menu items

menu.loadError: Failed to load menu. Server may be unavailable.
menu.saveError: Failed to save menu item. Please check the data and try again.

users.title: Users
users.subtitle: Manage blog user profiles
users.author: Author
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
users.allowedFormats: Allowed formats: JPG, PNG, GIF. Maximum size: 5MB
users.passwordHint: Leave fields empty if you don't want to change your password.
users.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
users.currentPasswordRequired: You must enter your current password to change it
users.adminAccessInfo: Administrators have full access to the CMS.
users.createFirst: Start by creating a new user

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize your blog settings
settings.blogContentLanguageHelp: Main language of your blog content
settings.blogTitleHelp: The main title of your blog
settings.blogDescriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of your blog
settings.blogDescriptionHelp: A brief description that will appear on the homepage
settings.timezoneHelp: Timezone for displaying dates on the blog
settings.domainHelp: The main domain of your blog
settings.googleAnalyticsHelp: Your Google Analytics ID to track visits

blogs.title: Blogs
blogs.subtitle: Manage your blogs
blogs.resetSelectionTooltip: Use if you have problems selecting blogs
blogs.selectError: Could not select blog. Error: {error}. Please try again or select another blog.
blogs.selectionReset: Blog selection has been reset. You can now select a valid blog.

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Log in to access the admin panel
login.enterCredentials: Please enter your email and password

login.browserError: Error logging in. Please check your browser settings.
login.unexpectedError: Unexpected error logging in. Please try again.

signup.title: Create account and blog
signup.success: Account created successfully! You can now log in.

forgotPassword.title: Recover Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to recover your password

errors.serverConnection: Failed to connect to server. Please check your connection and try again.

errors.serverTimeout: The server is taking too long to respond. Please check your connection.
